freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Description

Unknown

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Audio.Manager

Methods

  • SetMode
  • GetCurrentMode
  • SetOutputDevice
  • GetCurrentOutputDevice
  • GetAvailableOutputDevices
  • SetMicrophoneMute
  • GetMicrophoneMute
  • SetVolume
  • Mute
  • Unmute

Signals

  • VolumeChanged

Errors

  • NotSupported

Methods

SetMode ( s )

Description: Set the current audio mode. Currently there is only a difference between normal and call. Normal means all audio use when not in a phone call and call means all audio within a phone call.

Parameters

s: mode

GetCurrentMode ( ) → s

Description: Get the current audio mode which is used.

Returns

s: mode

SetOutputDevice ( s )

Description: Set the current audio output device which is used only within the current mode. If you switch mode then the manager will switch even the output to the last used one in the other mode.

Parameters

s: name

GetCurrentOutputDevice ( ) → s

Description: Get the current audio output device.

Returns

s: device

GetAvailableOutputDevices ( s ) → as

Description: Get all available audio outputs for the specified audio mode.

Parameters

s: mode

Returns

as: outputs

SetMicrophoneMute ( b )

Description: Set the mute state of the microphone.

Parameters

b: mute

GetMicrophoneMute ( ) → b

Description: Get the mute state of the microphone.

Returns

b: mute

SetVolume ( i )

Parameters

i: volume

The volume in percent (0-100).

Mute ( )

Description: Mute current output device.

Unmute ( )

Description: Unmute current output device.

Signals

VolumeChanged ( si )

Parameters

s: device

i: volume

Errors

NotSupported
